I'm a regular user of this toothpaste but each time the tube cracks after using it for few days. Initially thought maybe the tube cracked due to my fault but each time it continues to happen then I understood the quality of tube is not good. We are paying way more price than regular paste... Why can't the company maintain a minimum standard in its packaging? Even though these many people have raised their concern about tube... They are not making any change!
